name: Drone Destruction League - Arena 1 - HTML5
description:
Drone Destruction League - Arena 1

2 Player Local Multiplayer Arena 1 now available now to play for Free for a limited time on Windows 32 and 64 using the itch.io App.

If you have game development ideas please reach out, I'm easy to find.

2 Player Local Controls on One or Multiple Keyboards

Player 1 - W - Fly A - Left D - Right

Player 2 - ARROW KEYS - Up Left Right

2 Player Local Physics Based Competition


Gaming PC Recommended

Minimum Specs
NVidia 1080
8 GB RAM

120 MB Download

200 MB Installation Space


https://lesliemedia.itch.io/drone-destruction-league-arena-1
